documents.document: While my friends are all hip and cool and playing Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege, i'm stuck in 2013 playing Surgeon Simulator...
@normanstrange FOR SHAME NORMAN! :p
@normanstrange WOO! Twitter polls for the win! ;)
@normanstrange BUT THE RESULTS ARE IN! 3 TO 1 COOK SOME DINNER
@normanstrange DUDE you're gonna feel so much better when you cook something. Then you can look forward to spend money tomorrow at lunch
@praveenamz It's always such a thrill to watch! :D
This is the kind of ODI that I love to watch. What an incredibly nerve wracking match! #nzvaus
I think I just alerted my new neighbors that i'm a cricket fan... I shouted for joy and forgot I had the window wide open... #nzvaus
Even if Australia lose, Stoinis is King of the match. Incredible! #nzvaus
Boult... Have I told you lately that I love you? #NZvAUS
@justin_lester Thanks Justin, he really loved his job, and I know he'd be so glad (as am I) that you're Wellington's mayor :)
Was going through some old photos of Dad, found this one from the 2015 Anzac Parade. Looking proud & happy as a cla… https://t.co/1fU4fEBvcP
@mandieditchburn Agreed - alot of missed catches already, and poor running.
@CathyEllenRenee You go girl, You walk with your head held high. You are beautiful and wonderful and I love you
Ha! Wanting WCC to pay for her tattoo. Seriously?!! https://t.co/vhL5p6wky9
Absolutely fantastic. https://t.co/2TJS0wVJzD
Aah back in Wellington after an epic holiday in Tauranga. I thought I was getting a tan at one stage... but I just had dark sunglasses on.
@LorieBriggs I skimmed through the rest of the book... and didn't enjoy it. So i've started reading Stephen King's The Stand instead haha.
I needed a new book to read on holiday so I picked up The Lovely Bones... 8 chapters in... not really feeling it... should I keep reading?
Drunk singing Fairytale of New York is what Christmas Eve Eve is all about!!
The awkward moment when you wear @DLancasterActor's @KrampusMovie hoodie, and people ask you why "you're putting a downer on christmas"...
@FoodHeaIth Thank you for the food identification. Looks great btw
Finally got to open my #nzsecretsanta gift... and I LOVE IT! Gonna be great when i'm on holiday! Thank you and Merr… https://t.co/hDMt85UJoN
My #nzsecretsanta has made her tweets private again. Looks like i'll never find out, but I hoped you liked your gift! :)
My #nzsecretsanta prezzie has arrived! but since I sent it to a house with an actual mailbox, I will have to wait till Wednesday to open it.
@louderthoughts Feelin' like a bit of an editing wizard at the mo.
But I am happy with what i'm achieving - getting all wedding, funeral, & birthday videos out to clients before deadlines & before Christmas.
Boy it has been a tough week. Had to say goodbye to a close family friend, plus an extra work load, mixed with frantic Christmas preparation
@maryteatowel I hope I get you for #nzsecretsanta next year so I can send you a bunch of gifts! :)
@maryteatowel Yeah I gave something a little personal, had to dig deep to find clues to what she likes. Fingers crossed I did good! :)
@maryteatowel If they tweet that they like the gift then I might come out of hiding, if they don't like it... I might stay in the shadows...
@cmorganphotonz Oooh decisions... thanks!

Best finale from a 1st season of any show, ever. "Woah, WHAT!" - yelled me at the TV screen. Many times.
https://t.co/yZgKN3CSnl
We're allowed to tell our secret santas who gave them their gift after they receive it, right? #nzsecretsanta #thisismyfirstyear
Anyone else think the pulling of this ad is a bit ridiculous? The kids look older or close to 12 years old anyway. https://t.co/uCKhqinciG
YAAAS! My secret santa prezzie has arrived at the storehouse! Thank you kind stranger I can't wait to see what I get :)
My #nzsecretsanta present all wrapped up and ready to send tomorrow! Woohoo! https://t.co/l1mCGNl6Pw
I loved listening to She's a Mod on my walk to work. A great bouncy song to start my day. Love to his family. https://t.co/G8FjbDO3Yy
Me editing audio: The first 3 seconds out of an hour long outdoor shoot sounds fine... So far so good... 4 seconds in: *car horn*. Fuck.
Well while i'm waiting for my #nzsecretsanta match, i'd better give some more hints. I like artsy creative things, plants, & fun jewelry :)
#nzsecretsanta Seriously though, at the moment i'm really keen on novelty gadgets, like fun little items, eg. The c… https://t.co/OpkNxCIu6R
LOBSTER. CAVIAR. PUPPIES #thingsIwant #amIdoingitright #nzsecretsanta
OH HELL YES! https://t.co/JKOThzfIfF
Just signed up to do #nzsecretsanta this year! I will try my best, twitter stranger to get you something awesome!
With NZers really pulling together & helping each other at this time of need, we do NOT need this kind of hateful bullshit from Brian Tamaki
I think I know what I want for my birthday... https://t.co/bCAH1QmraV
Masters of Sex is REALLY raising the bar on quality television. This last episode was so beautifully written, with such incredible acting.
I feel sick to my stomach. It's all downhill from here. #Election2016
@louderthoughts Present company excluded of course.
@louderthoughts ...And although he continued to walk on by, my ponytail and I felt greatly violated.
@louderthoughts I saw the fire in his eyes as my elegant ponytail caught his attention, gently blowing in the breeze...
I took a risk today. I knew John Key was going to come into work. But yet I chose to wear my hair in a ponytail.
Hey fellow kids, we're hip! We like emojis! Buy our new car!! Ugh. One of the cringiest commercials i've ever seen. https://t.co/zLflMo6dfM
Incredibly excited when Green Day announced that their tour was coming to NZ. Not too excited about the $153.30 ticket price though...
Happy Bathurst Day! I know Dad will be watching eagerly from above, fingers crossed for @FabianCoulthard #Bathurst1000
Never try to go somewhere for dinner at 6pm in Wellington city when A: It's school holidays, and B: The WoW festival is on.
Back in the K.M.A.R.T. #kiwibeatles
The Long and Winding Rimutaka Hill Road #kiwibeatles
@louderthoughts An unconventional source of toilet paper... If you're that desperate.
@louderthoughts Oh. Damn. I am once again behind in the development of technology.
What if someone made an MP3 player with the option to time the music to the pace you're currently walking/running...
Just finished Stranger Things Season 1. It's fast becoming one of my favourite shows. And this guy. Best character. https://t.co/DmM8CPSNKC
Take a look at my latest wedding highlight video - a beautiful mid-winter ceremony at Zealandia, Wellington. https://t.co/AWxAMVBoK9
Up to episode 5 of Stranger Things. Haven't been this excited about a TV show in a long time. It's reawakening my old X-Files addiction.
Happiness is a ripe avocado.
Seriously though, Life is Strange. Get it. I absolutely loved the game. More twists and turns than a psychotic pretzel.
This decision.. hands down the hardest. Shaking, head in hands, wondering if I made the right choice. #LifeisStrange https://t.co/PWYUvKpx3u
Just finished playing #Lifeisstrange. Boy, some of those decisions... just.. just.. a rollercoaster of emotions. https://t.co/3B4nNXUVwi
Completing company tax forms got me like: https://t.co/Rd0W0Wwuii
Just rounding off the evening with some https://t.co/uWx43AIfGf
@louderthoughts Like almost all the papers I handed in at University, yes.
Finally upgraded to Windows 10, and am finally getting myself a new monitor that doesn't flicker when you turn it on. Moving with the times!
Drink it, drink it with tonic, drink it and rethink your life choices. https://t.co/dWp3WxhUVc
I put 'Rock&Roll Dreams Come Through' to the wedding video i'm working on for a lark. Strangely, it fit. Hope they are @RealMeatLoaf fans...
Is this what court is really like, @louderthoughts? Please tell me it is https://t.co/1gKZ9eKSP7
When you buy lipstick it should come with a bonus straw for drinking without ruining the colour.
I'm just gonna leave this here. This is very cute. https://t.co/qRrQZzOzbS
This is actually pretty darn exciting. https://t.co/DqqdYpVMSy
This last #GameofThrones episode was artistically incredible. Gonna try and find as many interviews with director Miguel Sapochnik as I can.
Have been watching a ton of short films lately. This one is so funny and creative, and narrated by @Nick_Offerman : https://t.co/VVHYbflWzH
Bloody Preston. I do SO many missions for him, and each time I report back, he's asleep. In MY old bed. I'M BUSTING MY ASS HERE!! #Fallout4
With a two week break before my next wedding to film, I have been researching and discovering new inspiration for my work. Feels great!
Making banana cake. Everything was going well, until the recipe gave instructions for... the LEMON icing. No. It's chocolate. everytime.
Editing confessions: I love editing a video clip of a bouquet of flowers in between video clips of people. Then I get to BOOST THE CONTRAST
Met a guy called Levon the other night. Had to ask. Yes, his parents were Elton John fans. I was very glad I asked.
@OspreyDawn @therosiewall Another one of Stuff's intriguing intellectual articles: https://t.co/3jcnyjoJe1
Yep, this is me. Every. Single. Time. #editinglife https://t.co/iK1NUGEAjC
Was listening to one of @qikipedia's podcasts, they said that 1% of New Zealanders are allergic to kiwifruit. Yay that's me! I'm in the 1%!!
I'm glad I live in walking distance of the National War Memorial Park and got to experience the Dawn Service there for the first time.
The only pet an art teacher can have is a cat. That's it. It's just the way the world is.
This is one of the blandest designs for a blender I have ever seen. And it's $1000. https://t.co/AIxREPdfdA
I didn't know that Rowan Atkinson was back on TV but i'm looking forward to watching him playing a 1950s detective. https://t.co/y1arfbiqix
I hope it'll be a windy day across the whole country tomorrow so the #nzflag can wave mightily at the top of flagpoles in its rightful place
Looking forward to filming a wedding out at Pencarrow Lodge on Friday where the bride & groom will arrive by helicopter!! How cool is that?!
@therosiewall Ah! I thought I recognized the plant wall! :)
@louderthoughts Nice! Lamb & a potato/kumara cake thing.. I was too tired/hungry at that stage in the night to identify what exactly it was
@therosiewall Are you by any chance working at the biz dojo?
Man oh man am I tired. Such a full on day, but it was a pleasure to film such a beautiful wedding. Such wonderful, fun, friendly people!
What a beautiful day, perfect for filming my first kiwi/indian wedding of the year! It's gonna be a long 13 hours, but it's gonna be great!
First time baking in the new house. Realised I forgot to bring the cup measurments... So here I am adding 26 tablespoons of flour to the mix
